about: For 50 years we’ve served a population of about 50,000 in a remote area of Northwest Haiti — notoriously poor and unsettled. Challenges in Bombardopolis include practical as well as spiritual, and we endeavor to show the love of God as we meet basic needs for these folks in Jesus' name.
donateLink: https://donorbox.org/haitihospital or Zelle: International Missionary Fellowship, Inc
